name: Bill Walsh College Football
overview: No time left...your wishbone QB dives in from the two but you're still down by one...gut check...kick for the tie? or GO FOR TWO and the national title. - Quick one step play calling - 48 of the best college teams from the last three decades - Incredibly Fast Gameplay - 11 game college season, playoffs and national championship - 68 classic college plays; triple option, wishbone, student body and more - 5 player ability - 360 Roving Replay - Automatic or manual pass catch mode - Play call "bluff mode" to disguise your plays - Set your own audibles anytime - Walsh report scouts each team - Player ratings posters with Coach Walsh's play picks for all teams
